match.authors: Tetiana Parshakova, J. Andreoli, Marc Dymetman
match.title: Global Autoregressive Models for Data-Efficient Sequence Learning

citance.context: One technique that is suitable for our objective here, namely sampling from a sequential EBM that includes an autoregressive component a(x), is the DPG ("Distributional Policy Gradient") algorithm (Parshakova et al., 2019b).
